author: Lily Hay Newman
title: Google Bans Infowars Android App Over Coronavirus Claims
description: Apple kicked Alex Jones out of the App Store in 2018. The Google Play Store has finally followed suit.
content: On Friday, Google removed the Infowars Android app from its Play Store, extinguishing one of the last mainstream strongholds of infamous conspiracy theorist Alex Jones. The takedown on the heels of a video, posted in the Infowars app last week and viewed by W… [+3558 chars]
